channel.title: CVE Feed for Power Line Communications -- PLC4TRUCKS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Power Line Communications -- PLC4TRUCKS

item.title: CVE-2022-26131|2024-08-03T04:56:37.802Z -- power%20line%20communications -- plc4trucks
item.description: Power Line Communications PLC4TRUCKS J2497 trailer receivers are susceptible to remote RF induced signals.

item.title: CVE-2022-25922|2024-08-03T04:49:44.366Z -- power%20line%20communications -- plc4trucks
item.description: Power Line Communications PLC4TRUCKS J2497 trailer brake controllers implement diagnostic functions which can be invoked by replaying J2497 messages. There is no authentication or authorization for these functions.
